𓅣 𓅡 𓃰 ≈ 𓃹 ≈ 𓃻 @ Punt 𓄔 𓄕 𓂈 phone 𓃀 𓇼

𓊹 @ Punt = 𓇾 𓊹

𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 Punt <> "frontier" 𓏃 𓏄 𓏅 𓏆 front 𒉺𒉌 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 Punt >> Djibouti <> gabouti "plate" gabood plateau 𓇹 #pꜣḫt 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 Punt > Phoenix ^^ fantasy wonderland 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 •Paranat <> Berenice <> pronto <> भारत Bhārata (Sind) 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 •Parsinat <> Persian pheasant 𓊝 trade routes beyond the red sea 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 •Paraneptun 𓋞 ≈ Paradies ( 𓃹 𓈖 𓃀 = ארנב Arneb אַרְנָב arnáv ) 1) Pbunnyt Punt 𓊝 shâphoina ال سفينة
2) Phasant 𓅡 ?
3) Phoenix 𓅣 𓋹 𓋁 ?

𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 𓈉 Posen™ Ποσὴν ! 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 𓈉 Pwene™ Opone, Ὀπώνη ἐμπόριον as later known by the ancient Greeks 𓊪 𓃹 𓈖 𓏏 𓈉 Opone emporium : Modern District and Port Hafun حافون African tip

𓎼 𓈖 𓃀 𓏏 𓅱 𓁸 𓀭 𓏪 | Pwenet | ?

Ill defined locative, sometimes over-localized as Ethyopia, Somalia, Djibouti, Horn of Africa, more correctly "frontier" or land of the Phoenixians.

According to Homer Phoenicians came from the Red Sea, thus linking them with Punt.

𓊹 𓌢 𓈖 𓏏 𓂋 𓊸 incense, aromatic resins, cinnamon @ Punt via India from Lanka

𓇿 𓈅 𓊪 𓍿 𓅓 𓎛 𓅱 | Libya | Terra 𐎱𐎢𐎫𐎠𐎹𐎠 p-u-t-a-y-a (-mahw)
𓇿 𓈅 𓊪 𓅘 𓎛 𓋴 | Nubia | Terra Punes < Punt
